about_the_game:
Design warships the way you want them, and fight against other players!

This is an essential add-on of the main game Ultimate Admiral: Dreadnoughts which provides a spectacular multiplayer combat mode in which you can fight vs your friends or other players.

Features


Warship constructor
Design battleships, battlecruisers, heavy or light cruisers, destroyers or smaller torpedo boats, any kind of naval warship you want to add in your fleet in an intuitive ship design interface. The technology era covers the historical period of 1890 till 1960 of pure naval warfare, without planes, submarines and aircraft carriers.

Experiment in infinite ways
Similarly as it works in the main game, you have almost 500 different ship hulls (more will be added in subsequent patches) for 10 Nations. Thousands of different ship parts and weapons that are special for your ships, can be arranged freely in 3D mode while various components are available to affect the overall ship statistics.

Prepare your fleets
All the ships you design can be arranged in fleets using an intuitive battle configurator. There are three main technology periods for your fleets: Pre-Dreadnoughts, Dreadnoughts, Modern. According to the pre-defined battle limits you allocate ships to your fleets to make a fighting force. Will you use smaller, cheaper and numerous ships or a few state of the art and expensive battleships? Your decisions will affect the outcome of the upcoming battles.

Fight fleets of other players or the AI
You select one or more fleets that you have prepared to seek a battle against a random human opponent or organize matches against your Steam friends. There is also the possibility to test your fleets against randomly generated AI fleets. As you win battles you increase your rank up to the level of “Ultimate Admiral”.

Your naval tactics will be challenged!
A naval combat vs another skillful human opponent is really a unique experience. If you have mastered the main game and you think you are a top admiral, then you can solidly prove or show off your advanced skills by fighting against other admirals in Ultimate Admiral: Dreadnoughts “Multiplayer”. Who knows, you might even learn something more from other skillful admirals, as you chat and play with them.

Thousands of different ship parts and weapons that are special for your ships, can be arranged freely in 3D mode while various components are available to affect the overall ship statistics.

name: Ultimate Admiral: Dreadnoughts "Multiplayer"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz, AMD FX-8350 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Design warships the way you want them, and fight against other players!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Ukrainian, Russian, Simplified Chinese
